nflverse 0.0.0.9000

nflverse

Overview

The nflverse is a set of packages dedicated to data of the National Football League. The nflverse package is designed to make it easy to install and load core packages from the nflverse in a single command.

Installation

The easiest way to get nflfastR is to install it from GitHub with:

if (!require("remotes")) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("nflverse/nflverse")

Usage

library(nflverse) will load the core nflverse packages:

  • nflfastR, for play-by-play data back to 1999.
  • nflseedR, for season simulations.
  • nfl4th, for 4th down analysis.
